Class Turtle

java.lang.Object
  Turtle

public class Turtle
extends java.lang.Object

A turtle graphics library built on StdDraw.

Author:
Robert Sedgewick, Kevin Wayne

Construct the Turtle object.

Parameters:
x0 - The starting x-coordinate for the turtle.
y0 - The starting y-coordinate for the turtle.
a0 - The degrees facing counterclockwise from the x-axis

                                double y0,
                                double x1,
                                double y1)
Set the user-defined coordinate system.

Parameters:
x0 - The x-coordinate of the lower left corner of canvas.
y0 - The y-coordinate of the lower left corner of canvas.
x1 - The x-coordinate of the upper right corner of canvas.
y1 - The y-coordinate of the upper right corner of canvas.

turnLeft

Turn the turtle left.

Parameters:
delta - The rotate orientation delta in degrees counterclockwise.

turnRight

Turn the turtle right.

Parameters:
delta - The rotate orientation delta in degrees clockwise.

goForward

Move the turtle forward.

Parameters:
step - The amount to move forward with the pen down.

pause

Pause the turtle from drawing.

Parameters:
t - The amount in milliseconds to pause the turtle.
